name: Naimur Rahman
bio: Statistics graduate and data enthusiast passionate about research, analytics, and transforming data into actionable insights.

courses.title: Data Analysis in Excel
courses.desc: A comprehensive program covering data cleaning, visualization, and analysis using Excel and spreadsheets. Including hypothesis testing, time series analysis and regression analysis in Excel and SPSS.

courses.title: Data Analytics with Excel, Power BI, SQL and Python
courses.desc: Learn SQL queries, joins, aggregations, and data extraction for analytics. Excel: Power Query, Power Pivot, and Power BI for data modeling and visualization. Python: Data manipulation with Pandas and data visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn. SQL: Database management and querying for data analytics.

projects.title: The association between breastfeeding practices and child nutrition status in Bangladesh
projects.desc: This study examines the impact of breastfeeding practices on child nutrition in Bangladesh. It analyzes exclusive breastfeeding, early initiation, and prelacteal feeding. Maternal, household, and regional factors are considered. The research highlights key determinants of malnutrition among children aged 0–23 months.

projects.title: UrbanCart-Sales-Analytics-SQL-Based-Business-Insights
projects.desc: A data-driven analysis of UrbanCart’s sales and customer behavior using SQL. The project identifies top-performing products, high-revenue product pairs, stock-out risks, customer retention trends, basket sizes, and payment method patterns. Key SQL functions used include SUM, AVG, COUNT, DATE_TRUNC, EXTRACT, CASE WHEN, RANK, ROW_NUMBER, INNER JOIN, LEFT JOIN, and CTEs. Actionable recommendations were derived to optimize inventory, promotions, cross-selling, and loyalty strategies, helping improve revenue and customer experience.

projects.title: Dynamic Sales Dashboard-Excel Base Business Insights
projects.desc: An interactive Excel dashboard built to analyze sales and transaction performance for a coffee and food business. The dashboard provides key KPIs such as total transactions, quantity sold, revenue, and profit, along with insights into product categories, weekly and monthly sales trends, year-over-year revenue comparison, city-wise performance, and revenue vs profit analysis. Dynamic slicers for Year, Month, and City enable real-time filtering and business-focused decision-making.

projects.title: RFM Segmentation - SQL Based Analysis
projects.desc: This project performs RFM Segmentation (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) using SQL to classify customers into meaningful segments. It helps businesses improve customer engagement, retention, and targeted marketing strategies.
